overview:
Robert Ostfield is CEO of andPOP Inc., a post he has held since 2007.

Prior to joining andPOP, Robert was the CEO and founder of RevoTV, a company that developed a Video Content Management System for online video publishers. In his current role, Robert has seen andPOP emerge as one of Canadaâ€™s premiere multiplatform sources for pop culture news and interviews. He has overseen a number of strategic partnerships that have extended andPOPâ€™s audience to reach over one million viewers across North America every month. He is involved in all aspects of andPOPâ€™s content development, including producing its popular radio show on XM Radio Canada, and TV show airing on AUX TV. Robert graduated from the Ted Rogers School of Management at Ryerson University in 2007 and is also a panelist for the North By North East Music Festival.
